Style Guide

Basic components for the brutalist design system.

Typography

Headers and body text use Geist Mono with clean styling.

Headings

All headings use uppercase styling with bold weights.

This is a blockquote with the classic brutalist styling and geometric borders.

Lists

Ordered lists with custom numbering:

Code Elements

Inline code looks like this: const brutalist = true; with inverted colors.

Code blocks maintain the monospace aesthetic:

// Brutalist code block
function createComponent() {
  return {
    style: 'brutalist',
    theme: 'monochrome'
  };
}
